analyzed: devassa muuḍa maṇi ppahāveṇa abaṇīdā me raṇa ppahāra veaṇā
iti ardha ukte mukham ācchādya śaṅkām nāṭayati
aye devasya mukuṭa maṇi prabhāveṇa apanītā me raṇa prahāra vedanā

original: ajja dāva kumāladussāsaṇavahāmarisideṇa sāmiṇā aṅgarāeṇa kuḍilabhiuḍībhaṅgabhīsaṇaṇiḍalabaṭṭeṇa
analyzed: ajja dāva kumāla dussāsaṇa vahāmarisideṇa sāmiṇā aṅgarāeṇa
abhijuttaḥ saḥ durāāraḥ majjhama paṇḍavaḥ bhīmaseṇa hadao
adya tāvat kumāra duḥśāsana vadha amarṣitena svāminā aṅga rājena kuṭila bhrukuṭī bhaṅga bhīṣaṇa niṭala paṭṭena a vijñāta saṃdhāna mokṣa śilīmukha saṃghāta varṣiṇā abhiyuktaḥ
sa durācāraḥ madhyama pāṇḍavaḥ bhīmasena hatakaḥ

original: {Pkt_108}tado deva uhaabalamilantadippantakarituraapadādisamubbhūdadhūliṇiareṇa pallatthagaaghaḍāsaṃghādeṇa a vittharanteṇa andhaāreṇa andhīkidaṃ  #
analyzed: deva pallattha gaa ghaḍā saṃghādeṇa a vittharanteṇa andha āreṇa
tatas devaḥ ubhaya bala milat dīpyamāna kari turaga padāti samudbhūta dhūli nikareṇa paryasta gaja ghaṭā saṃghātena ca vistīrṇa mānena andhakāreṇa andhīkṛtam ubhaya balam

original: {Pkt_109}tado deva dūrākaṭṭhiadhaṇugguṇācchoḍaṇaṭaṃkāreṇa gambhīrabhīsaṇeṇa jāṇīadi gajjidaṃ palaajalahareṇa tti /
analyzed: deva dūra ākaṭṭhia dhaṇugguṇa acchoḍaṇa ṭaṃkāreṇa gambhīra bhīsaṇeṇa jāṇīadi gajjidam palaa jalahareṇa tti

original: SktCh_109: tato deva dūrākṛṣṭadhanurguṇācchoṭanaṭaṃkāreṇa gambhīrabhīṣaṇena jñāyate garjitaṃ pralayajaladhareṇeti /
analyzed: tatas deva dūra ākṛṣṭa dhanuḥ guṇa ācchoṭana ṭaṃkāreṇa gambhīra bhīṣaṇena jñāyate garjitam pralaya jaladhareṇa iti
deva doṇṇam bi tāṇam aṇṇa uṇṇa siṃhaṇāda gajjida pisuṇam viviha
gambhīra tthaṇia cāpa jalaharam ppasaranta sara dhārā sahassa varisam jātam samara duddiṇam
tatas deva dvayoḥ api tayoḥ anyaḥ nya siṃhanāda garjita piśunam vividha parimukta praharaṇa āhata kavaca saṃgalita jvalana vidyut chaṭā bhāsuram
gambhīra stanita cāpa jaladharam prasarat śara dhārā sahasra varṣi jātam samara durdinam

original: {Pkt_111}tado a deva edassiṃ antare jeṭṭhassa bhāduṇo parābhavasaṅkiṇā dhaṇaṃjaeṇa
analyzed: a deva edassim antare jeṭṭhassa bhāduṇaḥ parābhava saṅkiṇā dhaṇaṃjaeṇa
turaṃgama saṃvāhaṇa vāpida vāsudeva saṅkha cakka asi gada alañchida caubbāhu daṇḍa duddaṃsaṇaḥ

original: SktCh_111: tataśca deva etasminnantare jyeṣṭhasya bhrātuḥ parābhavaśaṅkinā dhanaṃjayena
analyzed: tatas ca devaḥ etasmin antare jyeṣṭhasya bhrātuḥ parābhava śaṅkinā dhanaṃjayena
vajra nirghāta nirghoṣa viṣama rasita dhvaja agra sthita mahā vānaraḥ turaṃgama saṃvāhana vyāpṛta vāsudeva śaṅkha cakra asi gadā lāñchita catur bāhu daṇḍa durdarśana
āpūrita pāñcajanya devadatta tāra rasita pratirava bharita daśa diśā mukha kuharaḥ dhāvitaḥ tam uddeśam ratha varaḥ

original: {Pkt_112}tado bhīmaseṇadhanaṃjaehiṃ abhijuttaṃ pidaraṃ pekkhia sasaṃbhamaṃ vialiaṃ
analyzed: bhīmaseṇa dhanaṃjaehiṃ abhijuttam pidaram pekkhia sa saṃbhamam vialiam
raaṇa sīsaam ākaṇṇa ākaṭṭhida kaṭhiṇa kodaṇḍa jīaḥ dāhiṇa hatthukkhitta sara puṅkha vighaṭṭaṇa tuvara āida sārahio

original: SktCh_112: tato bhīmasenadhanaṃjayābhyāmabhiyuktaṃ pitaraṃ prekṣya sasaṃbhramaṃ vigalitamavadhūya
analyzed: tatas bhīmasena dhanaṃjayābhyām abhiyuktam pitaram prekṣya sa saṃbhramam vigalitam avadhūya
ratna śīrṣakam ākarṇa ākṛṣṭa kaṭhina kodaṇḍa jīvaḥ dakṣiṇa hasta utkṣipta śara puṅkha vighaṭṭana tvarita sārathiḥ tam

original: {Pkt_113}tado a deva teṇa āacchanteṇa evva kumālavisaseṇeṇa vidalidāsiladāsāmalasiṇiddhapuṅkhehiṃ
analyzed: a deva teṇa āacchanteṇa evva kumāla visa seṇeṇa
kaṭhiṇa kaṅka battehim kisaṇa vaṇṇehim kusumidaḥ via

original: tarū muhuttaeṇa silīmuhehiṃ pacchādido dhaṇaṃjaassa rahavaro /
SktCh_113: tataśca deva tenāgacchataiva kumāravṛṣasenena vidalitāsilatāśyāmalasnigdhapuṅkhaiḥ
analyzed: tatas ca deva tena āgacchatā eva kumāra vṛṣasenena vidalita asi latā śyāmala snigdha puṅkhaiḥ
kaṭhina kaṅka patraiḥ kṛṣṇa varṇaiḥ śāṇa śilā niśita śyāmala śalya bandhaiḥ kusumitaḥ iva
taruḥ muhūrtena śilīmukhaiḥ pracchāditaḥ dhanaṃjayasya ratha varaḥ

original: {Pkt_114}tado deva tikkhavikkhittaṇisidabhallabāṇavarisiṇā dhaṇaṃjaeṇa īsi vihasia bhaṇidaṃ /
analyzed: deva tikkha vikkhitta nisida bhalla bāṇa varisiṇā dhaṇaṃjaeṇa vihasia bhaṇidam

original: are re visaseṇa piduṇo bi dāva de ṇa juttaṃ maha kubidassa abhimuhaṃ ṭhāduṃ /
analyzed: are re visaseṇa piduṇaḥ bi dāva de ṇa juttam maha kubidassa abhimuham ṭhādum
evvam vāam ṇisamia guraaṇa ahi khebeṇa

original: cābadhāriṇā kumālavisaseṇeṇa bi mammabhedaehiṃ parusavisamehiṃ sudivahakidappaṇaehiṃ
analyzed: cāba dhāriṇā kumālavisaseṇeṇa bi mamma bhedaehiṃ parusa visamehiṃ

original: ṇibbhacchido gaṇḍīvī bāṇehiṃ ṇa uṇa duṭṭhavaaṇehiṃ /
analyzed: gaṇḍīvī bāṇehiṃ na uṇa duṭṭha vaaṇehiṃ

original: SktCh_114: tato deva tīkṣṇavikṣiptaniśitabhallabāṇavarṣiṇā dhanaṃjayeneṣadvihasya bhaṇitam /
analyzed: tatas deva tīkṣṇa vikṣipta niśita bhalla bāṇa varṣiṇā dhanaṃjayena īṣat vihasya bhaṇitam

original: are re vṛṣasena piturapi tāvatte na yuktaṃ mama kupitasyābhimukhaṃ sthātum /
analyzed: are re vṛṣasena pituḥ api tāvat te na yuktam mama kupitasya abhimukham sthātum
evam vācam niśamya guru jana adhikṣepeṇa uddīpita kopa uparakta mukha maṇḍala vijṛmbhita bhrukuṭī bhaṅga bhīṣaṇena
cāpa dhāriṇā kumāravṛṣasenena api marma bhedakaiḥ paruṣa viṣamaiḥ śrutipatha kṛta praṇayaiḥ nirbhartsitaḥ
gāṇḍīvī bāṇaiḥ na punar duṣṭa vacanaiḥ

original: bāṇaṇipadaṇapaḍisiddhadaṃsaṇappasareṇa patthudaṃ sikkhābalāṇurūbaṃ kiṃ bi accaliaṃ /
analyzed: bāṇa ṇi padaṇa paḍisiddha daṃsaṇa ppasareṇa patthudam sikkhā bala aṇurūbam kim bi
tatas deva niśita śara abhighāta vedanā upajāta manyunā kirīṭinā caṇḍa gāṇḍīvajīvā śabda nirjita vajra nirghāta ghoṣeṇa
bāṇa nipatana pratiṣiddha darśana prasareṇa prastutam śikṣā bala anurūpam kim api āścaryam

original: {Pkt_116}tado a deva taṃ tārisaṃ pekkhia sattuṇo samaravvābāracaurattaṇaṃ avibhāviatūṇīramuhadhaṇugguṇagamaṇāgamaṇasarasaṃdhāṇamokkhacaḍulakaraaleṇa
analyzed: deva tam tārisam pekkhia sattuṇaḥ samara vvā bāra caura ttaṇam a vibhāvia tūṇīra muha dhaṇugguṇa gamaṇa āgamaṇa sara saṃdhāṇa mokkha caḍula kara aleṇa
kumāla visa seṇeṇa bi sa visesam patthudam

original: SktCh_116: tataśca deva tattādṛśaṃ prekṣya śatroḥ samaravyāpāracaturatvamavibhāvitatūṇīramukhadhanurguṇagamanāgamanaśarasaṃdhānamokṣacaṭulakaratalena
analyzed: tatas ca deva tat tādṛśam prekṣya śatroḥ samara vyāpāra catura tvam avibhāvita tūṇīra mukha dhanuḥ guṇa gamana āgamana śara saṃdhāna mokṣa caṭula kara talena
kumāravṛṣasenena api sa viśeṣam prastutam samara karma

original: {Pkt_117}tado deva etthantare vimukkasamaravvābāro muhuttavissamidaverāṇubandho doṇaṃ bi kururāapaṇḍavabalāṇaṃ sāhu kumālavisaseṇa sāhu tti  #
analyzed: deva ettha antare vimukka samara vvābāraḥ muhutta vissamida vera anubandhaḥ doṇam bi kuru rāa paṇḍava balāṇam sāhu kumāla visaseṇa sāhu tti

original: SktCh_117: tato deva atrāntare vimuktasamaravyāpāro muhūrtaviśramitavairānubandho
analyzed: tatas deva atrā antare vimukta samara vyāpāraḥ muhūrta viśramita vaira anubandho

original: dvayorapi kururājapāṇḍavabalayoḥ sādhu kumāravṛṣasena sādhviti kṛtakalakalo vīraloko
analyzed: dvayoḥ api kuru rāja pāṇḍava balayoḥ sādhu kumāra vṛṣasena sādhu iti kṛta kalakalaḥ

original: samalakammālambheṇa harisarosakaruṇāsaṃkaḍe vaṭṭamāṇassa sāmiṇo aṅgarāassa ṇipaḍiā
analyzed: samala kamma ālambheṇa hari sarosa karuṇā saṃkaḍe vaṭṭamāṇassa sāmiṇaḥ aṅgarāassa nipaḍiā
tatas ca deva avadhīrita sakala dhānuṣka cakra parākrama śālinaḥ sutasya tathāvidhena
samara karma ārambheṇa harṣa roṣa karuṇā saṃkaṭe vartamānasya svāminaḥ ṅga rājasya nipatitā
śara paddhatiḥ bhīmasene bāṣpa paryākulā dṛṣṭiḥ kumāra vṛṣasene

original: turaesu sārahiṃ pi rahavare dhaṇuṃ pi jīāiṃ pi ṇalindalañchaṇe sidādabatte bi a vābārido
analyzed: turaesu sārahim pi rahavare dhaṇum pi jīāim pi nalinda lañchaṇe
tatas ca devaḥ ubhaya bala pravṛtta sādhukāra amarṣitena śara varṣa prajvalitena

original: gāṇḍīvinā turageṣu sārathāvapi rathavare dhanuṣyapi jīvāyāmapi narendralāñchane sitātapatre
analyzed: gāṇḍīvinā turageṣu sārathau api ratha vare dhanuṣi api jīvāyām api narendra lāñchane sita ātapatre

original: {Pkt_120}tado deva viraho lūṇaguṇakodaṇḍo paribbhamaṇavvābāramettappaḍisiddhasarasaṃpādo maṇḍalehiṃ viariduṃ pautto kumālo /
analyzed: deva virahaḥ lūṇa guṇa kodaṇḍaḥ maṇḍalehiṃ viaridum pauttaḥ kumālaḥ

original: SktCh_120: tato deva viratho lūnaguṇakodaṇḍaḥ paribhramaṇavyāpāramātrapratiṣiddhaśarasaṃpāto maṇḍalairvicarituṃ pravṛttaḥ kamāraḥ /
analyzed: tatas deva virathaḥ lūna guṇa kodaṇḍaḥ paribhramaṇa vyāpāra mātra pratiṣiddha śara saṃpātaḥ maṇḍalaiḥ vicaritum pravṛttaḥ kamāraḥ

original: {Pkt_121}tado deva sudarahaviddhaṃsaṇāmarisuddībideṇa sāmiṇā aṅgarāeṇa agaṇiabhīmaseṇābhijoeṇa parimukko dhaṇaṃjaassa ubari silīmuhāsāro /
analyzed: deva sāmiṇā aṅgarāeṇa agaṇia bhīmaseṇa abhijoeṇa parimukkaḥ dhaṇaṃjaassa ubari silīmuha āsāraḥ

original: kumālo bi parijaṇobaṇīdaṃ aṇṇaṃ rahaṃ āruhia puṇo bi pautto dhaṇaṃjaeṇa saha āodheduṃ /
analyzed: kumālaḥ bi aṇṇam raham āruhia puṇo bi pauttaḥ dhaṇaṃjaeṇa saha

original: SktCh_121: tato deva sutarathavidhvaṃsanāmarṣoddīpitena svāmināṅgarājenāgaṇitabhīmasenābhiyogena parimukto dhanaṃjayasyopari śilīmukhāsāraḥ
analyzed: tatas deva suta ratha vidhvaṃsana amarṣa uddīpitena svāminā aṅga rājena agaṇita bhīma sena abhiyogena parimuktaḥ dhanaṃjayasya upari śilīmukha āsāraḥ

original: kumāro 'pi parijanopanītamanyaṃ rathamāruhya punarapi pravṛtto dhanaṃjayena sahāyoddhum /
analyzed: kumāraḥ pi parijana upanītam anyam ratham āruhya punar api pravṛttaḥ dhanaṃjayena saha āyoddhum

original: {Pkt_122}tado deva bhaṇidaṃ a kumāleṇa re re tādāhikkhebamuhala majjhamapaṇḍava maha sarā tuha sarīraṃ ujjhia aṇṇassiṃ ṇa ṇibaḍanti /
analyzed: deva bhaṇidam a kumāleṇa re re majjhama paṇḍava maha sarā tuha sarīram ujjhia anṇassim na

original: tti bhaṇia sarasahassehiṃ paṇḍavasarīraṃ pacchādia siṃhaṇādeṇa gajjiduṃ pautto /
analyzed: tti bhaṇia sara sahassehiṃ paṇḍava sarīram pacchādia siṃhaṇādeṇa pauttaḥ

original: SktCh_122: tato deva bhaṇitaṃ ca kumāreṇa re re tātādhikṣepamukhara madhyamapāṇḍava mama śarāstava śarīramujjhitvānyasminna nipatanti /
analyzed: tatas deva bhaṇitam ca kumāreṇa re re tāta adhikṣepa mukhara madhyama pāṇḍava mama śarāḥ tava śarīram ujjhitvā anyasmin na nipatanti

original: iti bhaṇitvā śarasahasraiḥ pāṇḍavaśarīraṃ pracchādya siṃhanādena garjituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
analyzed: iti bhaṇitvā śara sahasraiḥ pāṇḍava śarīram pracchādya siṃhanādena garjitum pravṛttaḥ

original: {Pkt_123}tado a deva taṃ sarasaṃpādaṃ samavadhūṇia ṇisidasarābhighādajādamaṇṇuṇā

analyzed: kirīṭiṇā gahidā rahu chaṅgāt meha ubaroha vimukkaṇa hatthala ṇimmalā
viviha raaṇa ppahā bhāsura bhīsaṇa ramaṇī a daṃsaṇā sattī soba hāsam

original: SktCh_123: tataśca deva taṃ śarasaṃpātaṃ samavadhūya niśitaśarābhighātajātamanyunā
analyzed: tatas ca deva tam śara saṃpātam samavadhūya niśita śara abhighāta jāta manyunā
kirīṭinā gṛhītā ratha utsaṅgāt kvaṇat kanaka kiṅkiṇī jāla jhaṃkāra virāviṇī megha uparodha vimukta nabhastala nirmalā
niśita śyāmala snigdha mukhī vividha ratna prabhā bhāsura bhīṣaṇa ramaṇīya darśanā śaktiḥ
sa upahāsam vimuktā ca kumāra abhimukhī

original: {Pkt_124}tado a deva pajjalantiṃ sattiṃ pekkhia vialiaṃ aṅgarāassa hatthādo sasaraṃ dhaṇuṃ hiaādo vīrasulaho ucchāho ṇaaṇādo bāpphasalilaṃ  #
analyzed: a deva pajjalantim sattim pekkhia vialiam aṅgarāassa hatthādaḥ sasaram dhaṇum hiaādaḥ vīrasulahaḥ ucchāhaḥ ṇaaṇādaḥ bāppha salilam

original: hasidaṃ a dhaṇaṃjaeṇa siṃhaṇādaṃ viṇādidaṃ viodaleṇa dukkalaṃ dukkalaṃ tti ākkandidaṃ kurubaleṇa /
analyzed: hasidam a dhaṇaṃjaeṇa siṃhaṇādam viṇādidam viodaleṇa dukkalam dukkalam tti ākkandidam kuru baleṇa

original: SktCh_124: tataśca deva prajvalantīṃ śaktiṃ prekṣya vigalitamaṅgarājasya hastātsaśaraṃ dhanurhṛdayādvīrasulabha utsāho nayanādbāṣpasalilaṃ
analyzed: tatas ca deva prajvalantīm śaktim prekṣya vigalitam aṅga rājasya hastāt sa śaram dhanuḥ hṛdayāt vīra sulabhaḥ utsāhaḥ nayanāt bāṣpa salilam

original: hasitaṃ ca dhanaṃjayena siṃhanādaṃ vināditaṃ vṛkodareṇa duṣkaraṃ duṣkaramityākranditaṃ kurubalena /
analyzed: hasitam ca dhanaṃjayena siṃhanādam vināditam vṛkodareṇa duṣkaram duṣkaram iti ākranditam kuru balena

original: {Pkt_125}tado deva kumālavisaseṇeṇa ākaṇṇākiṭṭhaṇisidakhurappehiṃ ciraṃ ṇijjhāia addhapahe evva bhāīrahī via bhaavadā visamaloaṇeṇa tidhā kidā  #
analyzed: deva kumāla visa seṇeṇa ciram addha pahe evva bhāīrahī via bhaavadā visama loaṇeṇa tidhā kidā

original: SktCh_125: tato deva kumāravṛṣasenenākarṇākṛṣṭaniśitakṣurapraiściraṃ nidhyāyārdhapatha eva bhāgīrathīva bhagavatā viṣamalocanena tridhā kṛtā  #
analyzed: tatas deva kumāra vṛṣasenena ā karṇa ākṛṣṭa niśita kṣurapraiḥ ciram nidhyāya ardha pathe eva bhāgīrathī iva bhagavatā viṣama locanena tridhā kṛtā

original: {Pkt_126}tado a deva edassiṃ antare kidakalakalamuhareṇa vīraloasāhuvādeṇa antarido samaratūraravo /
analyzed: a deva edassim antare kida kalakala muhareṇa vīra loa sāhu vādeṇa antaridaḥ samara tūra ravaḥ
siddha cālaṇa gaṇa vimukka kusuma ppakareṇa pacchāt idam sama laṅgaṇam

original: SktCh_126: tataśca deva etasminnantare kṛtakalakalamukhareṇa vīralokasādhuvādenāntaritaḥ samaratūryaravaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca devaḥ etasmin antare kṛta kalakala mukhareṇa vīra loka sādhuvādena antaritaḥ samara tūrya ravaḥ
siddha cāraṇa gaṇa vimukta kusuma prakareṇa pracchāditam samara aṅgaṇam

original: bho viodala asamatto tuha maha bi samalavvābāro /
analyzed: bho viodala a samattaḥ tuha maha bi

original: pekkhāma dāva vacchassa tuha bhāduṇo a dhaṇuvvedasikkhāṇiuṇattaṇaṃ /
analyzed: pekkhāma dāva vacchassa tuha bhāduṇaḥ a
tatas ca deva bhaṇitam svāminā aṅga rājena
bho vṛkodara asamāptaḥ tava mama api samara vyāpāraḥ
prekṣāvahe tāvat vatsasya tava bhrātuḥ ca dhanurveda śikṣā nipuṇa tvam
